newsitem.title: CHINA: China Guilin opens new urban cooperative bank.
newsitem.headline: China Guilin opens new urban cooperative bank.

text.p: China's Guilin city in southern Guangxi region has opened an urban cooperative bank to offer banking services to the public, the Financial News said on Monday.
The new bank had been approved by the People's Bank of China, the central bank, the newspaper said in an official announcement.
The bank's licensed businesses include taking deposits, extending loans, domestic settlement, discounting bills and underwriting treasury bonds, it said.
